featured.text: Tree products have been an important part of diets for thousands of years, from early humans 26 fruits and nuts to the first cultivation of important trees, such as mango and apple.

definition.zh_def: 堅果，一種通常有硬殼的可食用種子或果實，富含脂肪和蛋白質。
definition.en_def: A hard-shelled fruit or seed, typically edible, that is rich in fats and proteins.
definition.example: I like to snack on almonds and walnuts, which are both healthy nuts.
